title: Add health diagnosis command capability review
description: Create a comprehensive validation command for the base/ template that checks task management system health and standardization in projects built from this codebase.
completion_notes: Created /validate-task-system command in base/.claude/commands/. This command validates task JSON schema, checks relationship integrity, ensures ID safety during breakdowns, verifies task-overview consistency, enforces status rules, and offers auto-fixes with user confirmation. Also removed redundant /update-tasks command since sync is handled by complete-task and breakdown, and health checks are now covered by validate-task-system. Updated base/CLAUDE.md to reflect new command structure.
